channel.title: [Project Insanity] Project Amazed v1 By:RTeam{Rewritten, Added Lots}Rswebclients
channel.description:
Project Amazed By:RTeam
[size=12pt]I PLAN ON MAKING THIS MY OWN VERSION OF JAGEX'S [F2P][/size] [size=12pt] I litterally rewrote like alot, alot ,alot! Added alot alot alot. [F2P][/size] Description and Details: Project Amazed was started by: RTeam. I made RTeam which consists of Me, and 2 other people who don't have Moparscape accounts. (in game names)[Mod Carlos, Mod Hacker, Mod Test] The reasons they are not in the pictures is because they both are real life friends and went on a 5 day vacation since Mar.1.
Features: I downloaded this and it had only 3 working skills. (Woodcutting, Mining, and All Combat Skills.) Nothing was on it.
Off the bat features: Fairly accurate accuracy formulas [No mess ups or screw ups] Hated clan chat [looks ugly] Base for skill menus [YES IRL] Re-Edited Perfect 317 GameFrame [This is a 474]
Skills & More: Custom Items: Twin Whip [Green] [I am making a new set of weapons series [Twin] same requiremnts as the other weapons just little stronger.] Compiler: 80% Compiler & Run together jdk 1.7.0 jdk 1.6.0 exit [Will perfect v2]
Others: Bank pins [Easy coding in with help] [I ADDED THIS] Boat system [Will not add coins required, idk?] [I ADDED THIS]
Combat: 100% PvP fully functionally [Thank god] PvN [1 problem, NO NPCS (TEEHEE)] PVM [Works Decent] Equipment requirements
Magic: 85% Every modern combat spell NO CUSTOM SPELLS Can't mage through walls Alching [30%]
Range: 100% Bows/arrows Can't shoot through walls Ranged distances
Prayer: 100% All bones bury-able Every prayer working properly Prayer bonus affects prayer drain rate
Mining: 90% Emptying and refilling rocks All ores can be mined Correct pickaxe finding and animations
Smithing: 3% Bronze Bars [Lol, i just added on itemonobject.java] CAN'T SMITH ANYTHING! ONLY BRONZE BAR :(
Fishing: 70% [No FishingSpot Npc] All fish can be caught Big net fishing Correct item requirements FALSE ANIMATIONS
Cooking: 60% Bread Meat Cakes Potatoes FALSE ANIMATIONS[No kneeling, when you click on range or fire it automatically just cooks all food and adds skillexp, sucks. :P]
Woodcutting: 100% Stumps and regrowing trees Correct hatchet animations All trees cut-able
Firemaking 90% All logs light able Correct animations Half Clipped
Crafting: 100% Leather crafting Full tanning Pottery (fired and unfired items) Gem cutting Jewellry making Spinning wheel
Runecrafting: 100% All altars working Correct multiple crafting Talismans "pull" to altars Tiaras enchanting
Fletching: 80% All logs can be fletched Correct interfaces Fletch 5, 10, x, all Bow stringing Arrow&Bolt making
Thieving: 90% NPC Thieving Correct anims & gfx Correct Respawn Times
Slayer: 90% Working slayer gem Working slayer shop All slayer masters [Just got to add them]
Farming: [20%] (was half way removing) All farming patch Herbs Tree farming Plant farming Potato farming ect.
Herblore: [70%] All potions makeable Weapon poisioning Vialwater on herb = potion (hate that)
Quest: None, adding Customs on V2
Minigames: Half godwar bosses [Got to add npc's :P] Half Fight Pits [fully working, some dupes.] Half Pest Control [again, Got to npc's :P] Half Barrows [Same, npc's] Half Fight Caves [63 waves rewritten] [Got to add Jad, and the others]
[size=18pt]EATING:[/size] All foods eatable [Their was no eatable foods] [Added it took forever to search]
Media:
Cooking [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/2im6pw.jpg[/img]
Combat [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/f0drbr.jpg[/img]
Eating: [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/6rohev.jpg[/img]
Firemaking: [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/2zp5z7r.jpg[/img]
Fishing: [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/54w4e0.jpg[/img]
Note: You can leech. On V2 i will be adding bunch of loadings. I will make doors just simply be left opened. I am planning on making this my view and version of how F2P is suppose to be, so i will be adding a skill [Quests], and i will remove like alot of p2p skills leave like 2 on. :), i did rewite a whole bunch of stuff.
Downloads: [Main Link][Packaged][url=http://uppit.com/gnfod4jeeyll/[Pi]_Project_Amazed.zip]http://uppit.com/gnfod4jeeyll/[Pi]_Project_Amazed.zip[/url] [Backup Link][url=http://up.ht/14dUjOb]http://up.ht/14dUjOb[/url] No need to add cache anywhere. Client comes with cache!
What to expect in v2: Removal of Minigames Removal of some p2p quests Adding Custom Npc's Adding Custom items [Twin set] Adding Custom Quests Adding Custom Minigame Adding Major loads of Npc's Adding major loads of doors, gates, etc. opening!
[size=14pt]Compatibles:[/size] Windows (any) Rswebclients.com [Client type:Project Insanity] RspsCoding.org [Client Type: Project Insanity]
Credits: 60% Sanity [Base, Client, being amazing converter] 35% RTeam [Me, other developers] [Rewritting, adding lots of stuff.] 5% Rune-Server, Moparscape people [Helping me add stuff. :)]
I just want you guys to know, Rteam rewrote and added custom, bank pin, boat system and alot of things. i deserve atleast 30% credits.

item.title: [Project Insanity] Project Amazed v1 By:RTeam{Rewritten, Added Lots}Rswebclients
item.dc:creator: @CarlosATheTruth CarlosATheTruth
item.description:
@CarlosATheTruth wrote:

skills function, like back in 2005-2008, just you either forgot or don’t know the animations…

we forgot to point out that we were removing some skills and didn’t remove it fully. Like i stated 2 times we plan on making this “our own f2p point of view version” like adding custom npcs, items, weapons. etc. wait until the next versions

The only skill that doesn’t function well is cooking, and fishing doesn’t do the animations.

Read full topic

item.description:
@malimt wrote:

great but , u have alot of skills to fix on V2 , i mean skills are bearly functional , idk why you would even release something without finishing it , not to be rude or anything but cmon , atleast fully finish it before releasing it …

Read full topic

item.title: [Project Insanity] Project Amazed v1 By:RTeam{Rewritten, Added Lots}Rswebclients
item.dc:creator: @CarlosATheTruth CarlosATheTruth
item.description:
@CarlosATheTruth wrote:

Ok just simply get out please.

“All i see is tutorials.” <- um am i showing you how to add anything and explaining.???

If you don’t like it jsut simpy say “i see you tryed but this is not for me.” or “I don’t like it.” and just leave and don’t come back. Or if you have anythign to say just message me.

Read full topic

item.title: [Project Insanity] Project Amazed v1 By:RTeam{Rewritten, Added Lots}Rswebclients
item.dc:creator: @Flame3 John
item.description:
@Flame3 wrote:

[quote=“CarlosATheTruth, post:10, topic:502730”]Yes, i don’t know if i posted it on the other topic i think i did.

I had that Delta one for months, and i decided to get 2 people (pre-RTeam), to help me out but they didn’t know delta much so i just added a couple things and released it. Then i had this pi also which i had for weeks, and decided to come back to it, and i plan on making lots of things to this special baby.
[Note- didn’t add all that on topic.][/quote]
All I see is tutorials and still no proof.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @CarlosATheTruth CarlosATheTruth
item.description:
@CarlosATheTruth wrote:

First: Stop posting more dumb info, or smart. Before we get in trouble.

Second: People release their ideas how they want to.

Three: Stop posting false info, that i wrote on topic, and you didn’t bother reading.

Fourth: Sorry for being mean but, i did alot of this. Now please just leave.

Read full topic

item.title: [Project Insanity] Project Amazed v1 By:RTeam{Rewritten, Added Lots}Rswebclients
item.dc:creator: @Flame3 John
item.description:
@Flame3 wrote:

[quote=“CarlosATheTruth, post:4, topic:502730”]Who said we got to have accounts to have credits??

3% smithing, sir.

When i got this smithing, firemaking, runecrafting, cooking, fishing, eating. weren’t even working. Been on this project for about 2 weeks. And please before you post a lie might want to read the topic, i added alot bro i was sitting here for 4 hours-5 adding stuff.[/quote]
I never said you didn’t do it. I said I don’t believe you because there is no proof to show that you did it yourself.
Also, your sprites are placed horribly.

Read full topic

When i got this smithing, firemaking, runecrafting, cooking, fishing, eating. weren’t even working. Been on this project for about 2 weeks. And please before you post a lie might want to read the topic, i added alot bro i was sitting here for 4 hours-5 a day, adding stuff.

@CarlosATheTruth wrote:

Project Amazed By:RTeam

[size=12pt]I PLAN ON MAKING THIS MY OWN VERSION OF JAGEX’S [F2P][/size]
[size=12pt] I litterally rewrote like alot, alot ,alot! Added alot alot alot.
[F2P][/size]
Description and Details:
Project Amazed was started by: RTeam. I made RTeam which consists of Me, and 2 other people who don’t have Moparscape accounts. (in game names)[Mod Carlos, Mod Hacker, Mod Test]
The reasons they are not in the pictures is because they both are real life friends and went on a 5 day vacation since Mar.1.

Features:
I downloaded this and it had only 3 working skills. (Woodcutting, Mining, and All Combat Skills.) Nothing was on it.

Off the bat features:
Fairly accurate accuracy formulas [No mess ups or screw ups]
Hated clan chat [looks ugly]
Base for skill menus [YES IRL]
Re-Edited Perfect 317 GameFrame [This is a 474]

Skills & More:
Custom Items:
Twin Whip [Green]
[I am making a new set of weapons series [Twin] same requiremnts as the other weapons just little stronger.]
Compiler: 80%
Compiler & Run together
jdk 1.7.0
jdk 1.6.0
exit
[Will perfect v2]

Others:
Bank pins [Easy coding in with help] [I ADDED THIS]
Boat system [Will not add coins required, idk?] [I ADDED THIS]

Combat: 100%
PvP fully functionally [Thank god]
PvN [1 problem, NO NPCS (TEEHEE)]
PVM [Works Decent]
Equipment requirements

Magic: 85%
Every modern combat spell
NO CUSTOM SPELLS
Can’t mage through walls
Alching [30%]

Range: 100%
Bows/arrows
Can’t shoot through walls
Ranged distances

Prayer: 100%
All bones bury-able
Every prayer working properly
Prayer bonus affects prayer drain rate

Mining: 90%
Emptying and refilling rocks
All ores can be mined
Correct pickaxe finding and animations

Smithing: 3%
Bronze Bars [Lol, i just added on itemonobject.java]
CAN’T SMITH ANYTHING! ONLY BRONZE BAR

Fishing: 70%
[No FishingSpot Npc]
All fish can be caught
Big net fishing
Correct item requirements
FALSE ANIMATIONS

Cooking: 60%
Bread
Meat
Cakes
Potatoes
FALSE ANIMATIONS[No kneeling, when you click on range or fire it automatically just cooks all food and adds skillexp, sucks. :P]

Woodcutting: 100%
Stumps and regrowing trees
Correct hatchet animations
All trees cut-able

Firemaking 90%
All logs light able
Correct animations
Half Clipped

Crafting: 100%
Leather crafting
Full tanning
Pottery (fired and unfired items)
Gem cutting
Jewellry making
Spinning wheel

Runecrafting: 100%
All altars working
Correct multiple crafting
Talismans “pull” to altars
Tiaras enchanting

Correct interfaces
Fletch 5, 10, x, all
Bow stringing
Arrow&Bolt making

Thieving: 90%

Correct anims & gfx
Correct Respawn Times

All slayer masters [Just got to add them]

Herbs
Tree farming
Plant farming
Potato farming ect.

Herblore: [70%]
All potions makeable
Weapon poisioning
Vialwater on herb = potion (hate that)

None, adding Customs on V2

Minigames:

Half Fight Pits [fully working, some dupes.]
Half Pest Control [again, Got to npc’s :P]
Half Barrows [Same, npc’s]
Half Fight Caves [63 waves rewritten] [Got to add Jad, and the others]

[size=18pt]EATING:[/size]
All foods eatable
[Their was no eatable foods]
[Added it took forever to search]

Media:

Combat

Note:
You can leech. On V2 i will be adding bunch of loadings. I will make doors just simply be left opened. I am planning on making this my view and version of how F2P is suppose to be, so i will be adding a skill [Quests], and i will remove like alot of p2p skills leave like 2 on. :), i did rewite a whole bunch of stuff.

Downloads:

No need to add cache anywhere. Client comes with cache!

What to expect in v2:

Adding Custom Minigame
